articles.content: Less than two weeks after his 32nd birthday, former San Francisco 49ers offensive lineman Mike Person has called it a career, announcing his retirement to 406MTSports.com. The veteran offensive linem… [+1527 chars]

articles.author: Clara Morris, Jiazhen Zhang, Phil Pasternak
articles.title: How the Mavericks collapsed after their 2011 NBA Championship - SB Nation
articles.description: Dirk Nowitzki remained Dallas’ star, but the Mavericks still fell all the way to the bottom.
articles.content: In 2011 the Dallas Mavericks were on top of the world. A team in the truest sense of the word, veteran role players bolstered the stars. Dallas beat the Miami Heat, and their fancy big three, to brin… [+704 chars]
